resources.string: Functionality Scene: Select this functionality to obtain the description of a scene from an image
Functionality Text: Select this functionality to get the text from an image read outloud
Functionality Categories: Select this functionality to identify an object among a series of categories
Funcionality Translation: Select this functionality to translate the text appearing inside an image to the selected language among the available ones
Would you like to analyze an image from your gallery or take a photo now?
The image to be analyzed is displayed here
Camera or storage access permissions are needed to make use of this functionality
There has been an error with the text recognition
There has been an error while getting the image description. Make sure you have internet connection.

Translating the detected text in the image. Wait a second please. If it is the first time using a language, it is possible that the application takes some minutes to download the necessary models for the translation
There has been an error during text translation
There has been an error. It is possible you don\'t have the language models necessary for the translation. Connect to an Internet Connection via WIFI to download them.
Login to check your previously performed image analysis
Introduce your email and password and choose if you rather login (if you already have an account) or register if you don\'t
The password must be at least 6 characters long
There has been an error during the login
There has been an error during the registration
You must introduce a valid email and password. The password must be at least 6 characters long
The email introduced is already being used
There isn\'t any user with this email address
The account and all its data have been deleted correctly
Food category: Select this category to identify different types of food in images
Birds category: select this category to identify different types of birds in images
Insects category: select this category to identify different types of insects in images
Plants category: select this category to identify different types of plants in images
There has been an unexpected error during the image identification. Try again later.
It was not possible to identify any object of the selected category in the image
Object of the category detected in the image:
